Name: Chepari
Ingredients: 30 ml Patrón Silver blanco tequila infused with cherry & tonka
20 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
History: Adapted from a recipe created for Campari by Bettina Kupsa in Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Chepari contains 183 calories
Garnish: Orange foam (prepared beforehand with 50cl orange juice, 5cl sugar, and 3 egg whites).
